mapper.insert: MERGE INTO ALARM USING DUAL ON (TO_USER_ID = #{toUserId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SEQ_ALL = 'Y' WHERE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT INTO ALARM( USER_ID , APP_SEQ , TO_USER_ID )VALUES( #{userId} , #{appSeq} , (SELECT USER_ID FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NUM = #{toUserId}) )
mapper.select: SELECT ALARM_STATUS , ALARM.USER_ID , ALARM.APP_SEQ , ALARM.TO_USER_ID FROM ALARM,EMP,APPROVAL WHERE ALARM.USER_ID = EMP.USER_ID AND ALARM.APP_SEQ = APPROVAL.APP_SEQ AND ALARM.TO_USER_ID = #{userId} AND ALARM_STATUS = 'N'
